Data Fields

file_lines Struct Reference

Type declaration to a structure to store the references to lines of files, and the number of lines that the structure has access. More...

#include <sorterlib.h>

Data Fields

void ** lines

int num_lines

Detailed Description

Type declaration to a structure to store the references to lines of files, and the number of lines that the structure has access.

See also:
allocate_memory_for_lines for reference
